A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A bit boring and lacked focus. Too many extraneous jokes and characters\, too many plot holes and things that just plain didn't make sense given everything we know about the Star Wars universe. We desperately want to see more about the current state of affairs in the Galaxy and be taken to cool\, new places ... not stuck aboard a spaceship slowly losing fuel for half the movie\, with nothing the bad guys can do but fire every so often at their shields and wait???
